message: Let's be reasonable, Bob. Take this good offer while it lasts!
Let's split the difference a bit more fairly, Alice. Every round counts for both of us!
I'm willing to compromise a little, Bob, but time is running out!
Alice, this is a fair deal.  We both need to agree before inflation eats away at the value!
Okay Bob, this is my final offer.  Let's close this deal and get something!
